column4: should switch [relatively] seamlessly though....maybe the problem is at the receiving end?
so ap #1 is your main wireless router, and ap #2 is just a bridged mode ap with no DHCP?...thinking that the ip changeover is the holdup?

Its cause he has two different wifi networks. It has to drop one to connect to the other. You need to get one network, and then extend it, instead of making two. Seamless switching since both are the same network.
